00017 #include "MisrReadData.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <mfhdf.h>
00022 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00023 
00051 MTKt_status MtkReadBlock(
00052   const char *filename,    
00053   const char *gridname,    
00054   const char *fieldname,   
00055   int block,               
00056   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf   )
00057 {
00058   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00059   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00060   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00061   int32 fid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS File id */
00062 
00063   if (filename == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00064 
00065   /* Open file. */
00066   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00067   if (fid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00068 
00069   /* Read block. */
00070   status = MtkReadBlockFid(fid, gridname, fieldname, block, databuf);
00071   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00072 
00073   /* Close file. */
00074   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00075   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00076   fid = FAIL;
00077 
00078   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00079  ERROR_HANDLE:
00080   if (fid != FAIL) GDclose(fid);
00081   return status_code;
00082 }
00083 
00089 MTKt_status MtkReadBlockFid(
00090   int32 fid,               
00091   const char *gridname,    
00092   const char *fieldname,   
00093   int block,               
00094   MTKt_DataBuffer *databuf   )
00095 {
00096   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00097   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00098   intn hdfstatus;       /* HDF-EOS return status */
00099   int32 gid = FAIL;     /* HDF-EOS Grid id */
00100   int32 start[10];      /* HDF-EOS start dimension */
00101   int32 edge[10];       /* HDF-EOS edge dimension */
00102   int32 hdf_datatype;       /* HDF-EOS data type */
00103   int32 rank;           /* HDF-EOS rank */
00104   int32 dims[10];       /* HDF-EOS dimensions */
00105   char dimlist[80];     /* HDF-EOS dimension name list */
00106   char *basefield = NULL;   /* Base fieldname */
00107   int nextradims;               /* Number of extra dimensions */
00108   int *extradims = NULL;    /* Extra dimension list */
00109   MTKt_DataBuffer databuf_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00110                 /* Temp data buffer */
00111   MTKt_DataType datatype;   /* Mtk data type */
00112   int i;            /* Loop index */
00113 
00114   if (gridname == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00115   if (fieldname == NULL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00116   if (block < 1 || block > 180) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00117 
00118   gid = GDattach(fid, (char*)gridname);
00119   if (gid == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDATTACH_FAILED);
00120 
00121   status = MtkParseFieldname(fieldname, &basefield, &nextradims, &extradims);
00122   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00123 
00124   hdfstatus = GDfieldinfo(gid, basefield, &rank, dims, &hdf_datatype, dimlist);
00125   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDFIELDINFO_FAILED);
00126 
00127   if (rank != nextradims + 3) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00128 
00129   status = MtkHdfToMtkDataTypeConvert(hdf_datatype, &datatype);
00130   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00131 
00132   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(dims[1], dims[2], datatype, &databuf_tmp);
00133   if (status != MTK_SUCCESS) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00134 
00135   start[0] = block - 1;
00136   start[1] = 0;
00137   start[2] = 0;
00138 
00139   edge[0] = 1;
00140   edge[1] = dims[1];
00141   edge[2] = dims[2];
00142 
00143   for (i = 3; i < rank; i++) {
00144     start[i] = extradims[i-3];
00145     edge[i] = 1;
00146   }
00147 
00148   hdfstatus = GDreadfield(gid, basefield, start, NULL, edge,
00149               databuf_tmp.dataptr);
00150   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDREADFIELD_FAILED);
00151 
00152   hdfstatus = GDdetach(gid);
00153   if (hdfstatus == FAIL) MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDDETACH_FAILED);
00154 
00155   *databuf = databuf_tmp;
00156 
00157   free(basefield);
00158   free(extradims);
00159   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00160  ERROR_HANDLE:
00161   if (gid != FAIL) GDdetach(gid);
00162   if (basefield != NULL) free(basefield);
00163   if (extradims != NULL) free(extradims);
00164   MtkDataBufferFree(&databuf_tmp);
00165   return status_code;
00166 }
